title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The power of cloud network innovation (INV213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云网络创新的力量 (INV213)
abstract: Journey through an evolution of AWS networking and discover how it continues to serve as the foundation for how AWS delivers on the promise of cloud computing. Join Robert Kennedy, VP of Network Services, as he unveils innovative breakthroughs powering today's cloud infrastructure. Through customer examples and exclusive behind-the-scenes insights, learn how AWS transforms networking across every layer - from our global backbone to AI/ML-optimized data centers, advanced content delivery, enhanced perimeter protection and security, scalable VPC networking, and global connectivity solutions. Watch how these innovations enable customers to build the next generation of cloud applications and modern networks.
abstract_cn: 探索 AWS 网络的演进历程，了解它如何持续作为 AWS 兑现云计算承诺的基础。加入网络服务副总裁 Robert Kennedy，揭示驱动当今云基础设施的创新突破。通过客户案例和独家幕后洞察，了解 AWS 如何在每一层转变网络 - 从我们的全球骨干网到 AI/ML 优化的数据中心、先进的内容分发、增强的边界保护和安全性、可扩展的 VPC 网络以及全球连接解决方案。观看这些创新如何使客户能够构建下一代云应用程序和现代网络。
